instName: ﻿St. Vincent's Abbey of the Benedictine Order
instNote: ﻿The following priories are attached to the abbey: Carrolltown, Cambria Co., and Bulter, Butler Co. There are also houses at Pittsburgh, Indiana, Indiana Co., Greensburgh and Johnstown. The names of the resident Fathers are given in the Clergy List.
